post:
Hi all,

I am selling my WeLoveServers VPS bought here: http://lowendbox.com/blog/black-friday-weloveservers-19year-1gb-and-7month-3gb-openvz-vps-in-five-locations/

LEB 1GB

1GB RAM

1.2GB vSwap

4 vCPU Cores

30GB Disk space

1TB Bandwidth

100Mbps uplink --> I upgraded this to 1Gbps as per their offer

1x IPv4 address

OpenVZ/SolusVM

I have sent a ticket to WeLoveServers who confirmed they are happy to transfer.

I bought the VPS on 2 December 2013 so there's still about 7 months left on the VPS. The price was $19/year.

Price: $8 or nearest offer. Payment via Paypal. PM or post here. Thanks.

Reason for selling: I'm in Australia and have moved everything to an Aussie server.
